name: tm39
effect: Teaches Rock Tomb to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rock Tomb to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II & I: Swift)

flavor_text.black_white: Boulders are hurled at the target. It also lowers the target’s Speed by preventing its movement.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Boulders are hurled at the target. It also lowers the target’s Speed by preventing its movement.
